name: nventiveReleaseNotesCompiler
description: A task to generate a markdown file containing release notes for a given release.
author: nventive

inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: Application environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the environment targeted by the application (Staging, Production, etc.)

inputs.name: AdditionalReleaseNotesFile
inputs.label: Additional release notes file
inputs.helpMarkDown: A file containing additional release notes to append at the end of the ones generated.

inputs.name: OutputFilePath
inputs.label: Output file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: A file where to save the release notes.

inputs.name: CreateTruncatedVersion
inputs.label: Create a truncated version of the release notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Creating a truncated version of the release notes can be helpful when using services with a character limit on release notes markdonwn (like AppCenter); this will cause 2 files to be generated.

inputs.name: TruncatedOutputFilePath
inputs.label: Truncated output file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: A file where to save the truncated release notes.

inputs.name: CharacterLimit
inputs.label: Character limit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum number of character the markdown file should have.

inputs.name: RemoveHyperlinks
inputs.label: Remove hyperlinks from release notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replace all markdown hyperlinks with only the name (ex: `[Check this out](https://dev.azure.com/)` will be replace with Check this out.

OutputVariables.name: ReleaseNotesPath
OutputVariables.description: The path to the full release notes.

OutputVariables.name: TruncatedReleaseNotesPath
OutputVariables.description: The path to the truncated release notes.
